en.OFFICIAL ROLEX RETAILER IN BELGRADE, BUD: OFFICIAL ROLEX RETAILER IN BELGRADE, BUDAPEST AND PORTO MONTENEGRO
en.Christie’s Achieves World Record Price f: Christie’s Achieves World Record Price for Any Rolex Sold at Auction

hu.Rolex broke through the magic $1 million: Kolekcionarski model 4113, sa funkcijom hronografa koji pokrece Valjoux kalibar 55 VBR dostigao je cenu od cak 1.163.340 americkih dolara, što je najviši registrovani iznos za Rolex satove. Neobicno velikog precnika od 44 milimetra, Rolex Antimagnetique od ner?ajuceg celika na taj nacin ušao je u istoriju prestižnih aukcijskih nadmetanja.
hu.The record-setter is a reference 4113 si: Pažnja strucnih medija i kolekcionara ne cudi, buduci da je u pitanju model koji je izra?en u svega dvanaest primeraka, sa hronografom koji ima dve kazaljke za merenje vremena, što ponosnom vlasniku omogucava da meri dva vremenska intervala istovremeno.
hu.Overall the sale brought more than $26.3: Ovogodišnja verzija casovnika Oyster Datejust Special Edition predstavlja dizajn koji je atraktivniji nego ikada.
hu.This year's Oyster Perpetual Datejust Sp: Najnoviji model u portfoliu kompanije Tudor nastao kroz saradnju sa legendarnim imenom u svetu brzine – fabrikom motocikala Ducati. Inspirisan adrenalinom, Tudor Fastrider Black Shield dolazi u crnom matiranom kucištu od keramike, precnika 42 milimetra.
hu.The Swiss maker of sport watches and the: Rolex je 1985. godine postao prva casovnicarska kompanija koja je upotrebila superleguru 904L za izradu kucišta. U pitanju je materijal koji omogucava vrhunske karakteristike, kao i izuzetnu otpornost na koroziju.
hu.Rolex uses 904L steel for its steel watc: Ocaravajuci stil klasicnog oblika dekorisan je sa dvanaest dragih kamenja, popularnog brilijantskog nacina obrade dijamanata. Kucište precnika 34 milimetra izra?eno je od patentiranog Everose zlata, dok je jedinstveni brojcanik ukrašen sedefnim sjajem i ženstvenim motivima.
hu.The effect is luminous, exquisite and en: A bold incarnation of a feminine classic, its 34 mm 18 ct Everose gold case, bracelet and bezel exerts an intoxicating power, and the bezel sparkles with 12 brilliant-cut diamonds, elegantly showcased in 18 ct white gold settings.
hu.Zahvaljujuci pa\u017eljivoj selekciji i: 904L marries perfectly with the other precious metals used by Rolex. A super alloy, 904L is extremly resistan and highly polishable.
hu.Tudor Fastrider Black Shield se isporucu: The decidedly sporty spirit of these chronographs is accentuated by the pushers fitted into the middle case through black PVD-coated cylinders reminiscent of engine cylinders and by the tachymetric scale engraved on the bezel.
hu.Tradicionalna crvena boja, za\u0161titni: Representing the ultimate expression of reliability and performance, the Fastrider line by Tudor forcefully expresses the fiercely competitive world of motorcycle racing. These Fastrider chronographs, featuring a 42 mm steel waterproof case, are equipped with the Tudor calibre 7753 self-winding movement boasting a 46-hour power reserve.
hu.Sedamdeset deveto nadmetanje bice organi: The Swiss maker of sport watches and the Italian motorcycle manufacturer have just renewed their partnership initiated in 2011. While it is mere coincidence that both companies were founded in 1926, chance cannot explain the shared vision created by two very different activities.
hu.Vrhunski kvalitet je kompletiran i samon: The new Datejust Special Edition stands out thanks to its sensuous lines, feminine form and new invisible clasp. It also boasts typical Rolex precision and reliability, being as always superbly water-resistant and featuring a COSC-certified self-winding mechanical movement.
